crap.name: zm_puzzle_deathrun
crap.description: A deathrun map that attempts to be fair.

crap.name: id_mehis
crap.description: Identity cup tournament map, A.K.A. australian ice.

crap.name: mehisjourney01
crap.description: Longer and more difficult jump map.

crap.name: zm_box_fortress
crap.description: Survivors must defend their base using, you guessed it, boxes.

crap.name: comm5_mehis
crap.description: Rough first map for a community project in Quake 2 jump mod.

crap.name: zmr_deathball
crap.description: ZM and the survivors are pitted against each other in a football match. Re-imagining of a classic ZM map, zm_deathball.

crap.name: zm_dm_sabreduel
crap.description: The survivors must fight each other with lightsabers. Only one shall survive. Remake of the original zmdm_sabreduel.

crap.name: zm_box_master
crap.description: Survivors are split into teams and they must climb to the top using boxes before the water catches up to them or another team gets there first.

crap.name: zm_explosion
crap.description: Survivors are tasked with stopping an evil computer. Contains a bunch of difficult jumping puzzles.

crap.name: zm_cityflood
crap.description: The survivors must find a way to the top of a tall building and escape via helicopter. My first map. ðŸ¥²

collaborations.description: Co-authored with Yeckoh. Technically just a port from the ZM version.

ports.name: cs_crackhouse_og
ports.description: Port of CSS version of cs_crackhouse to CS:GO.
